txt.en: 'A great goblin-king once lived within Mount Gram, [placeholder]. Now his kin are worthless wretches, easily beaten into submission and only worthy of labour. We've agreed to assist the miserable curs in their village to the east of here.\n\n'Travel to Arador's End and seek out the village of Grothum. You will find Bok and tell him you are there to assist.'
'Help comes, yes! You here to help Snowreap! Snowreap helps Angmar! Snowreap helps Mordirith! Snowreap helps Lugbúrz!\n\n'You come here, we give thanks!'
'I'll not tolerate this, [placeholder]. Get your carcass to Grothum, or I'll see it in this night's gruel!'

Grothum is the village in the north-eastern stretch of the Ettenmoors known as Arador's End. It is here that the Snowreap-goblins, who dwell in old dwarf-ruins throughout the Misty Mountains, have congregated to assist the war-host with the Isendeep Mine.
Worthless Cur! Your reward is failure!
Bok is at the goblin-village of Grothum located in the north-east stretches of the Ettenmoors.\n\nSoldier Faltúrz directed you to make yourself available to the Goblins of Grothum.
